content:
# I successfully harvested 10 coal, bringing my total inventory to:
# - 22 wood
# - 10 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 2 iron plates

# Now that I have coal again, I can return to the stone furnace and insert coal to continue smelting the remaining iron ore into iron plates.

# I will insert 5 coal into the furnace to ensure it has enough fuel to smelt the remaining iron ore.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting coal into the furnace

# After inserting coal, I will check the furnace's inventory to confirm the status and see if it starts smelting.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace_entity)  # Inspecting the furnace's inventory again
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Checking what's in the furnace's inventory

# I will also check my inventory again to ensure everything is updated.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the updated inventory after the coal insertion
